An hourglass is a mechanical device used to measure the passage of time. It 
comprises two glass bulbs connected vertically by a narrow neck that allows a 
regulated trickle of material (historically sand) from the upper bulb to the lower 
one. Factors affecting the time interval measured include the sand quantity, the .... 
symbol that human existence is fleeting, and that the "sands of time" will run...
